headline: Thomson Reuters Corp to Join the Nasdaq-100 Index® Beginning July 28, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, July 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today announced that Thomson Reuters Corp (Nasdaq: TRI), will become a component of the Nasdaq-100 Index® (Nasdaq: NDX®) and the Nasdaq-100 Equal Weighted™ Index (Nasdaq: NDXE™) prior to market open on Monday, July 28, 2025. Thomson Reuters Corp will replace ANSYS, Inc. (Nasdaq: ANSS) in the Nasdaq-100 Index® and the Nasdaq-100 Equal Weighted™ Index. ANSYS, Inc. will also be removed from the Nasdaq-100 Tech Sector™ Index (Nasdaq:
